imdb.plot outline: Digital Interactive Web Television Portal for study of Grade 5 and 6 Math Fractions. Using a sitcom device, the Portal engages children with digital interactive games, films and animation on subjects ranging from arrays, equivalence and constant ratios, addition, subtraction, multiplication and division of fractions guide by The Madcap Math Portal guides.
imdb.title: The Madcap Learning Adventure
plot: Digital Interactive Web Television Portal for study of The Civil War and increasing learning outcomes. What caused the war? Why did people fight? Why did the country secede? The Portal is guided by the Madcap History Portal guides.::David Devine

Digital Interactive Web Television Portal for study of Grade 5 and 6 Math Fractions. Using a sitcom device, the Portal engages children with digital interactive games, films and animation on subjects ranging from arrays, equivalence and constant ratios, addition, subtraction, multiplication and division of fractions guide by The Madcap Math Portal guides.
